greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Positive integers with primes p replaced by 2p and also 3p replaced by 2p.
comment: The smoothed version of A064413 (A256417) is a rearrangement of these terms.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: # Apply p->2p, 3p->2p to a sequence t1
for n from 1 to M do
elif (t1[n] mod 3 = 0 ) and isprime(t1[n]/3) then t2:=[op(t2),2*t1[n]/3];
else t2:=[op(t2),t1[n]]; fi; od: t2; end;
mathematica: Range[70] /. {n_ /; PrimeQ[n] -> 2n, n_ /; PrimeQ[n/3] -> 2n/3} (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 04 2018 *)
xref: Cf. A010051, A064413, A256416 (the sorted sequence), A256417.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 05 2015
